ISSUE.TITLE: [Design] The disabled components don’t look like they are disabled. It makes it hard to understand that the fields in Content History are not editable.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Steps to reproduce - Go to an entry with a component - Click on the 3 dots - Click on Content History (you will need a paid license) - See that the components look like they are editable ### Expected behavior Disabled components should have a disabled design. ### Screenshots ![CleanShot 2024-07-05 at 16 27 51@2x](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/528b3634-8d44-4db2-8ee8-1c469594b25c) ### Expected design ![CleanShot 2024-11-06 at 17 04 48@2x](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c7fb4c08-57fd-4c3c-9ee8-bd676a982ed2)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: ticket #20796 fix: [Design] The disabled components don’t look like they are disabled. It makes it hard to understand that the fields in Content History are not editable.
ticket #20796 fix: [Design] The disabled components don’t look like they are disabled. It makes it hard to understand that the fields in Content History are not editable.
